## Brand Use Module

Handles downloading brand extensions or plain brand repositories
and copying brand files (YAML + referenced assets) to \_brand/.

## Operations

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function extractBrandFilePaths(brandYamlPath, onWarning?): string[];
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/brand.ts:299](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/37bf2e9d3de84ff4271bbf66623282b21f7c155e/packages/core/src/operations/brand.ts#L299)

Extract all local file paths referenced in a brand YAML file.

Extracts paths from:

- logo.images.\* (string or { path, alt } objects).
- logo.small, logo.medium, logo.large (string or { light, dark } objects).
- typography.fonts[].files where source is "file".

### Parameters

| Parameter       | Type                  | Description                                                   |
| --------------- | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `brandYamlPath` | `string`              | Absolute path to the brand YAML file                          |
| `onWarning?`    | (`message`) => `void` | Optional callback for non-fatal warnings (e.g., parse errors) |

### Returns

`string[]`

Array of unique relative file paths

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function findBrandFile(stagedDir): BrandFileInfo | null;
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/brand.ts:136](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/37bf2e9d3de84ff4271bbf66623282b21f7c155e/packages/core/src/operations/brand.ts#L136)

Find the brand file in a staged directory.

Search order:

1. Root: \_brand.yml / \_brand.yaml (plain brand repo).
2. \_extensions/\* (direct children).
3. \_extensions/\*/\* (nested owner/name).

### Parameters

| Parameter   | Type     | Description                          |
| ----------- | -------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `stagedDir` | `string` | Extracted/staged directory to search |

### Returns

Brand file info or null if not found


Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/install.ts:293](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/37bf2e9d3de84ff4271bbf66623282b21f7c155e/packages/core/src/operations/install.ts#L293)

Install an extension from a source.

### Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                        | Description          |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| `source`  | [`InstallSource`](operations.TypeAlias.InstallSource.qmd)   | Installation source  |
| `options` | [`InstallOptions`](operations.Interface.InstallOptions.qmd) | Installation options |

### Returns

```{=html}
<code>Promise&lt;<a href="operations.Interface.InstallResult.qmd" style="text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-style: dashed; text-decoration-thickness: 1px; text-decoration-color: currentColor;">InstallResult</a>&gt;</code>
```

Installation result

### Example

```{.typescript filename="TypeScript"}
// Install from GitHub
const source = parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/fontawesome");
const result = await install(source, { projectDir: "." });
console.log(`Installed ${result.extension.id.name}`);

// Install with progress tracking
await install(source, {
  projectDir: ".",
  onProgress: ({ phase, message }) => console.log(`[${phase}] ${message}`),
});
```

## Operations

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function parseInstallSource(input, checkExists?): InstallSource;
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/install.ts:164](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/37bf2e9d3de84ff4271bbf66623282b21f7c155e/packages/core/src/operations/install.ts#L164)

Parse an install source string.

### Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                  | Default value   | Description                                    |
| ------------- | --------------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| `input`       | `string`              | `undefined`     | Source string (GitHub ref, URL, or local path) |
| `checkExists` | (`path`) => `boolean` | `fs.existsSync` | -                                              |

### Returns

[`InstallSource`](operations.TypeAlias.InstallSource.qmd)

Parsed InstallSource

### Example

```{.typescript filename="TypeScript"}
// GitHub reference
parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/fontawesome");
// { type: "github", owner: "quarto-ext", repo: "fontawesome", version: { type: "latest" } }

// GitHub with version
parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/lightbox@v1.0.0");
// { type: "github", ..., version: { type: "tag", tag: "v1.0.0" } }

// URL
parseInstallSource("https://example.com/ext.zip");
// { type: "url", url: "https://example.com/ext.zip" }

// Local path
parseInstallSource("./my-extension");
// { type: "local", path: "./my-extension" }
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/brand.ts:616](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/37bf2e9d3de84ff4271bbf66623282b21f7c155e/packages/core/src/operations/brand.ts#L616)

Download and apply a Quarto brand to a project.

Downloads/extracts the source, finds the brand YAML file, extracts referenced
asset paths, and copies the brand file (renamed to \_brand.yml) plus assets
into the project's \_brand/ directory.

### Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                  | Description                            |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `source`  | `string` \| [`InstallSource`](operations.TypeAlias.InstallSource.qmd) | Brand source (string or InstallSource) |


```{.typescript filename="TypeScript"}
});
```
